verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
REJOICE EVERMORE,
For this is the will of God.
Rejoice evermore,
For this is the will of God.
Rejoice evermore,
For this is the will of God
In Christ Jesus concerning you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pray without ceasing,
For this is the will of God...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In everything give thanks,
For this is the will of God...
